# Lai King Catholic Secondary School

| image                   = Lai King Catholic Secondary School (Hong Kong).jpg
| schooltype              = Secondary school
| religious_affiliation   = Catholicism
| established             =
| website                 =
}}
Lai King Catholic Secondary School () is a Catholic secondary school in Lai King, Hong Kong. It opened in 1979 and is `1q3245one of the few schools on the Lai King Estate. The school has over sixty staff and the principal is Mr Lau Kwong Yip.
